attributes.action: Condemnation and sanctions for the Venezuelan Government
attributes.additional_details: I am writing in order to ask for your help to condemn and sanction the violence generated by the Venezuelan Government during the last two weeks, against the Right to Protest and Violation of Human Rights. The Venezuelan Government has stopped a TV Channel (NTN24) to broadcast in Venezuela and has threaten CNN with same measures. The Bolivarian National Guard and Paramilitary Terrorist groups called "The Collectives" are working together to stop peaceful Protest and terrorise students and general public.
